title: Request Release of a Federal Tax Lien
description: A taxpayer has paid their tax debt in full and needs to have the IRS release the Notice of Federal Tax Lien filed against their property.

tasks.description: Verify that the taxpayer's account balance with the IRS is zero.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent requests an account transcript and confirms the debt is fully paid.

tasks.description: Contact the IRS to request the release of the tax lien.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent speaks with the IRS collections department.

tasks.description: Obtain a copy of the Certificate of Release of Federal Tax Lien (Form 668(Z)) for the client's records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent secures proof that the lien has been released.
